summary: Website/admin panel project with a request to deliver the admin panel as an installable PWA (app-like on mobile) instead of an APK.
architectural_notes: Prefer PWA approach for mobile: add web app manifest + service worker to enable installability (Add to Home Screen) and app-like experience for the admin panel.

existing_features.title: Update the PWA manifest so installing from the Admin Panel provides an admin-focused install experience: set the manifest `start_url` to `/admin` and add a shortcut entry for the Admin Panel route.

Ensure the service worker supports SPA navigation for the installed PWA so deep links like `/admin`, `/dashboard`, and `/pay/<id>` reliably load when opened from the home screen (no blank page / network error due to missing cache or navigation handling).

Adjust the Admin Panel install guide UI copy so it explicitly communicates that the Admin Panel can be installed and used app-like via “Add to Home Screen” (English only), and include a brief note that this is the supported alternative to an APK.

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert the admin panel web app into a PWA so it can be installed on mobile (Add to Home Screen) and used app-like without needing an APK.

projectName: Make the Admin Panel installable as a focused PWA experience (Android Add to Home Screen)
